title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 418 - Storage Of Motor Fuel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 418 - Storage Of Motor Fuel

State Regulations
§ 418.1 - Records required of persons who store motor fuel
§ 418.2 - Duties and responsibilities of terminal operators relating to manifests
§ 418.3 - Information returns
§ 418.4 - Licensing of terminal operators
§ 418.5 - Cancellation or suspension of a license as a terminal operator
§ 418.6 - Transfer of a license as a terminal operator
§ 418.7 - Notifications of cancellation, suspension or refusal to license

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 418

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 12-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
